detectors.description: Crowdsale.withdrawRLC(address,uint256) () ignores return value by RLC.transfer(to,amount) ()

Crowdsale.RLCSentToBTC () is never initialized. It is used in:
	- Crowdsale.receiveETH(address) ()
detectors.markdown:
[Crowdsale.RLCSentToBTC]() is never initialized. It is used in:
	- [Crowdsale.receiveETH(address)]()

detectors.description:
Crowdsale.owner () is written in both
	owner = msg.sender ()
	owner = msg.sender ()
detectors.markdown:
[Crowdsale.owner]() is written in both
	[owner = msg.sender]()
	[owner = msg.sender]()

detectors.description:
Crowdsale.withdrawETH(address,uint256).to () lacks a zero-check on :
		- r = to.send(amount) ()

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.receiveETH(address) ():
	External calls:
	- ! transferRLC(beneficiary,rlcToSend) ()
		- RLC.transfer(to,amount) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- RLCSentToETH += rlcToSend ()
	- minCapReached = (RLCSentToETH + RLCSentToBTC) > minCap ()
	- receivedETH += msg.value ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Crowdsale.receiveETH(address)]():
	External calls:
	- [! transferRLC(beneficiary,rlcToSend)]()
		- [RLC.transfer(to,amount)]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [RLCSentToETH += rlcToSend]()
	- [minCapReached = (RLCSentToETH + RLCSentToBTC) > minCap]()
	- [receivedETH += msg.value]()

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.receiveETH(address) ():
	External calls:
	- ! transferRLC(beneficiary,rlcToSend) ()
		- RLC.transfer(to,amount) ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- ETHReceived(beneficiary) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Crowdsale.receiveETH(address)]():
	External calls:
	- [! transferRLC(beneficiary,rlcToSend)]()
		- [RLC.transfer(to,amount)]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [ETHReceived(beneficiary)]()

detectors.description:
Crowdsale.bonus(uint256) () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- now < (startBlock + 864000) ()
	- now < startBlock + 1728000 ()
detectors.markdown:
[Crowdsale.bonus(uint256)]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [now < (startBlock + 864000)]()
	- [now < startBlock + 1728000]()

detectors.description:
Crowdsale.receiveETH(address) () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (now > endBlock) || (now < startBlock) ()
detectors.markdown:
[Crowdsale.receiveETH(address)]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [(now > endBlock) || (now < startBlock)]()
